summary: The diff implements nearly all requested requirements. REQ-1 through REQ-6 are substantially addressed: backend model extended with new fields, updateTournament function added, migration module created, TournamentManagementPanel updated with edit UI, useUpdateTournament hook added, and TournamentDetailPage has auto-reveal logic. However, there are notable gaps: REQ-3 defaults new fields to null rather than empty strings / 0 as specified; REQ-6 registration check always returns false making the reveal logic non-functional for actual players.

missing_requirements.requirement: New fields default to empty strings / 0 on existing records during migration
missing_requirements.reason: The migration module sets roomId = null, roomPassword = null, roomVisibilityMinutes = null instead of empty strings and 0 as required by the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: Registered players see Room ID and Password once current time >= (startTime - roomVisibilityMinutes)
missing_requirements.reason: The useIsUserRegistered hook always returns false because no user-facing registration check endpoint is implemented, meaning no player will ever see room credentials regardless of their actual registration status.

hallucinated_features.description: Server-side maskRoomCredentials helper function in the backend actor that masks room credentials based on caller role and visibility window timing
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only specifies frontend-side reveal logic in REQ-6. A server-side masking function was not requested and introduces logic not described in any requirement.
